socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Carrion Golem that grants added physical damage for your non-golem minions. hybrid.secDescrText: This spell causes one of your existing Sentinels of Dominance to Ascend, becoming more powerful, gaining new attacks, and overriding its duration, while maintaining its monster modifiers and other bonuses, including from support gems. socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which makes nearby allies inflict impale with attacks, and lessens the accuracy of nearby enemies. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
